job.title: Jr Software Engineer
job.description:
Experience needed: 0-5 years

Its an in office position south Indianapolis, Indiana area, relocation is required, starting salaries is negotiable, were willing train up if necessary. Our tech stack is React, Node, Python, Postgresql, & React Native.

You would be working on database intake systems improving query performance & building charts, various user interfaces for clients & staff to interact with our weather data. Other work may include rebuilding our legacy website, upgrading maintaining our application, & building up our API, & more. This is a full stack position you may be required to learn languages & tools you have never used before. This is an on call position if a bug comes up you must be available to drop everything & fix it if necessary.
